svg.text: Neural Codec Language Model • Zero-Shot Voice Cloning • Bilingual EN/AR

g.text: user: Convert the text to speech:

svg.text: Clone any voice with 3 seconds of audio — no fine-tuning required

g.text: Bilingual text with automatic language detection
"Welcome مرحبا بكم to the Audar AI demonstration تجربة"
/wɛlkəm mærħæbæ bikum tu ðə ɔdɑr eɪaɪ dɛmənstreɪʃən tædʒribæ/
Model learns voice from reference codes in prompt context, generates target in same voice
Target text spoken in reference speaker's voice
LR: 1e-5 • Steps: 140k • Batch: 2×16×8=256 effective • bf16+tf32 • Label masking: only target_codes (not ref_codes) • 100% cross-text conditioning
